title: Find Help
description: Find treatment locators and helplines such as the 988 Suicide & Crisis Lifeline, FindTreatment.gov, FindSupport.gov, and others.
cleaned_text: Title Find Help 988 Suicide & Crisis Lifeline 988 Suicide & Crisis Lifeline 24-hour, toll-free, confidential support for people in distress. Prevention and crisis resources for you or your loved ones. [Call or text 988](tel:988). Veterans Crisis Line Veterans Crisis Line Reach caring, qualified responders with the Department of Veterans Affairs. Many of them are Veterans themselves. Dial [988](tel:988) then press 1. SAMHSA's National Helpline SAMHSA's National Helpline 24/7 free and confidential treatment referral and information about mental and substance use disorders, prevention, and recovery. Call [1-800-662-HELP](tel:1-800-662-4357). page break Last
